content: game of thrones house targaryen a sock pattern by christine pike a game of thrones is the first book in a song of ice and fire a series of novels by author george r r martin the story of a song of ice and fire takes place mainly on the continent of westeros house targaryen is one of the great houses of westeros currently in exile the blood of the dragon were once the conquerors of all seven kingdoms and ruled as the kings of westeros for nearly 300 years their sigil is a three-headed dragon breathing flames i knit these socks using dpns so the directions here are written for this method those using 2 circular needles or magic loop method can easily make the adjustment i have only included directions for one size med/large to make this pattern larger or smaller i suggest experimenting with a larger or smaller needle size pattern is also adjustable using increments of 8 keep in mind that the finished sock is somewhat flexible as it is ribbed ~ 1 ~ cuff cast on 64 stitches and divide equally join in the round and *knit 3 purl 1* around for 14 row leg begin pattern below and knit for desired length ending after row 5 pattern is very simple in theory but can be a bit fiddly especially for tight knitters like myself just try to remember to be relaxed on the row before the daisy/star stitch occurs row 1 *knit 3 purl 1* around row 2 *knit 3 purl 1* around row 3 *knit 3 purl 1* around row 4 *knit 3 purl 1* around row 5 *knit3tog/yo/knit3tog into the same three stitches purl 1* around stitch note knit three together but leave those stitches hanging on the left needle while you yarn over on the right needle… and then knit those same three stitches together off of the left needle before dropping them you should now have 3 new stitches on your right needle i m a thrower so it might work different for you if you re a picker heel note that when setting up for your heel you will need to move the last stitch a purl from the heel needle s to the instep needle s so you will be knitting 31 stitches for the heel and 33 stitches across the instep i have not included specific instructions for heels or toes please use your favourite technique for knitting those portions of your socks house targaryen socks ~ 2 ~
